tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_raw_donor_transactions CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_raw_donor_transactions AS SELECT vmpt.amp_activity_id, vmpt.amp_funding_id AS funding_id, vmpt.amp_fund_detail_id, vmpt.transaction_type, vmpt.adjustment_type, vmpt.transaction_date, to_char(vmpt.transaction_date, 'J')::integer AS date_code, vmpt.transaction_amount, vmpt.expenditure_class, vmpt.currency_id, vmpt.originating_org_id, vmpt.financing_instrument_id, vmpt.terms_of_assistance_id, vmpt.funding_status_id, vmpt.mode_of_payment_id,
(SELECT max(amp_status_id) FROM v_status vs WHERE vs.amp_activity_id = vmpt.amp_activity_id) status_id, (SELECT max(level_code) FROM v_modalities vm WHERE vm.amp_activity_id = vmpt.amp_activity_id) modality_id, (SELECT max(level_code) FROM v_type_of_cooperation vtoc WHERE vtoc.amp_activity_id = vmpt.amp_activity_id) type_of_cooperation_id, (SELECT max(level_code) FROM v_type_of_implementation vtoi WHERE vtoi.amp_activity_id = vmpt.amp_activity_id) type_of_implementation_id, (SELECT max(id) FROM v_procurement_system vps WHERE vps.amp_activity_id = vmpt.amp_activity_id) procurement_system_id,
CAST(NULL as bigint) AS component_id, vmpt.agreement_id AS agreement_id,
vmpt.capital_spend_percent, vmpt.disaster_response,
vmpt.src_role, vmpt.dest_role, vmpt.dest_org_id,
CAST (CASE WHEN vmpt.pledge_id IS NULL THEN 999999999 ELSE vmpt.pledge_id + 800000000 END AS bigint) AS related_entity_id
FROM v_mondrian_pure_transactions vmpt UNION ALL SELECT aa.amp_activity_id AS amp_activity_id, f.amp_funding_id AS funding_id, mf.amp_fund_mtef_projection_id AS amp_fund_detail_id, 3 AS transaction_type, mf.amp_projected_categoryvalue_id AS adjustment_type, mf.projection_date AS transaction_date,
to_char(mf.projection_date, 'J')::integer AS date_code,
mf.amount AS transaction_amount, (999999999) AS expenditure_class, mf.amp_currency_id AS currency_id,
f.amp_donor_org_id AS originating_org_id, f.financing_instr_category_value AS financing_instrument_id, f.type_of_assistance_category_va AS terms_of_assistance_id, f.funding_status_category_va AS funding_status_id, f.mode_of_payment_category_va AS mode_of_payment_id,
(SELECT max(amp_status_id) FROM v_status vs WHERE vs.amp_activity_id = aa.amp_activity_id) status_id, (SELECT max(level_code) FROM v_modalities vm WHERE vm.amp_activity_id = aa.amp_activity_id) modality_id, (SELECT max(level_code) FROM v_type_of_cooperation vtoc WHERE vtoc.amp_activity_id = aa.amp_activity_id) type_of_cooperation_id, (SELECT max(level_code) FROM v_type_of_implementation vtoi WHERE vtoi.amp_activity_id = aa.amp_activity_id) type_of_implementation_id, (SELECT max(id) FROM v_procurement_system vps WHERE vps.amp_activity_id = aa.amp_activity_id) procurement_system_id,
CAST(NULL as bigint) AS component_id, COALESCE(f.agreement, 999999999) AS agreement_id,
NULL AS capital_spend_percent, NULL as disaster_response,
src_role.role_code AS src_role, dest_role.role_code AS dest_role, mf.recipient_org_id AS dest_org_id,
cast (999999999 AS bigint) as related_entity_id
FROM amp_activity aa JOIN amp_funding f ON aa.amp_activity_id = f.amp_activity_id JOIN amp_funding_mtef_projection mf ON f.amp_funding_id = mf.amp_funding_id LEFT JOIN amp_role src_role ON src_role.amp_role_id = f.source_role_id LEFT JOIN amp_role dest_role ON dest_role.amp_role_id = mf.recipient_role_id WHERE (mf.projection_date BETWEEN '1970-1-1' AND '2050-1-1') UNION ALL SELECT aav.amp_activity_id AS amp_activity_id, 999888777 as funding_id, 900000000 + aav.amp_activity_id AS amp_fund_detail_id, 999 AS transaction_type, (SELECT acv.id FROM amp_category_value acv WHERE acv.category_value='Actual' AND acv.amp_category_class_id = (SELECT acc.id FROM amp_category_class acc WHERE acc.keyname = 'adjustment_type')) AS adjustment_type, '1970-01-01' AS transaction_date, to_char(to_date('1970-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'J')::integer AS date_code,
100 AS transaction_amount, (999999999) AS expenditure_class,
(SELECT amp_currency_id FROM amp_currency WHERE currency_code = (SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_Settings WHERE settingsname = 'Base Currency')) AS currency_id, (999999999) AS originating_org_id, (SELECT min(acv.id) FROM amp_category_value acv WHERE acv.amp_category_class_id = (SELECT acc.id FROM amp_category_class acc WHERE acc.keyname = 'financing_instrument')) AS financing_instrument_id, (SELECT min(acv.id) FROM amp_category_value acv WHERE acv.amp_category_class_id = (SELECT acc.id FROM amp_category_class acc WHERE acc.keyname = 'type_of_assistence')) AS terms_of_assistance_id, (SELECT min(acv.id) FROM amp_category_value acv WHERE acv.amp_category_class_id = (SELECT acc.id FROM amp_category_class acc WHERE acc.keyname = 'funding_status')) AS funding_status_id, (SELECT min(acv.id) FROM amp_category_value acv WHERE acv.amp_category_class_id = (SELECT acc.id FROM amp_category_class acc WHERE acc.keyname = 'mode_of_payment')) AS mode_of_payment_id,
(SELECT max(amp_status_id) FROM v_status vs WHERE vs.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id) AS status_id, (SELECT max(level_code) FROM v_modalities vm WHERE vm.amp_activity_id =aav.amp_activity_id) AS modality_id, (SELECT max(level_code) FROM v_type_of_cooperation vtoc WHERE vtoc.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id) AS type_of_cooperation_id, (SELECT max(level_code) FROM v_type_of_implementation vtoi WHERE vtoi.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id) AS type_of_implementation_id, (SELECT max(id) FROM v_procurement_system vps WHERE vps.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id) AS procurement_system_id,
CAST(NULL as bigint) AS component_id, (999999999) AS agreement_id,
NULL AS capital_spend_percent, NULL AS disaster_response,
'DN' AS src_role, cast (NULL as text) as dest_role, cast (NULL as bigint) as dest_org_id,
cast (999999999 as bigint) as related_entity_id
FROM amp_activity_version aav LEFT JOIN amp_funding aff ON aff.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id WHERE (NOT EXISTS ( select * from amp_funding_detail afd JOIN amp_funding af ON afd.amp_funding_id = af.amp_funding_id AND af.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id JOIN amp_role src_role ON src_role.amp_role_id = af.source_role_id AND src_role.role_code='DN' )) AND (NOT EXISTS ( select * from amp_funding_mtef_projection mf JOIN amp_funding af ON mf.amp_funding_id = af.amp_funding_id AND af.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id JOIN amp_role src_role ON src_role.amp_role_id = af.source_role_id AND src_role.role_code='DN' ))
UNION ALL
SELECT aav.amp_activity_id AS amp_activity_id, 999888777 as funding_id, 900000000 + aav.amp_activity_id AS amp_fund_detail_id, 999 AS transaction_type, (SELECT acv.id FROM amp_category_value acv WHERE acv.category_value='Actual' AND acv.amp_category_class_id = (SELECT acc.id FROM amp_category_class acc WHERE acc.keyname = 'adjustment_type')) AS adjustment_type, '1970-01-01' AS transaction_date, to_char(to_date('1970-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'J')::integer AS date_code,
100 AS transaction_amount, (999999999) AS expenditure_class,
(SELECT amp_currency_id FROM amp_currency WHERE currency_code = (SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_Settings WHERE settingsname = 'Base Currency')) AS currency_id, vd.amp_donor_org_id AS originating_org_id, (SELECT min(acv.id) FROM amp_category_value acv WHERE acv.amp_category_class_id = (SELECT acc.id FROM amp_category_class acc WHERE acc.keyname = 'financing_instrument')) AS financing_instrument_id, (SELECT min(acv.id) FROM amp_category_value acv WHERE acv.amp_category_class_id = (SELECT acc.id FROM amp_category_class acc WHERE acc.keyname = 'type_of_assistence')) AS terms_of_assistance_id, (SELECT min(acv.id) FROM amp_category_value acv WHERE acv.amp_category_class_id = (SELECT acc.id FROM amp_category_class acc WHERE acc.keyname = 'funding_status')) AS funding_status_id, (SELECT min(acv.id) FROM amp_category_value acv WHERE acv.amp_category_class_id = (SELECT acc.id FROM amp_category_class acc WHERE acc.keyname = 'mode_of_payment')) AS mode_of_payment_id,
(SELECT max(amp_status_id) FROM v_status vs WHERE vs.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id) AS status_id, (SELECT max(level_code) FROM v_modalities vm WHERE vm.amp_activity_id =aav.amp_activity_id) AS modality_id, (SELECT max(level_code) FROM v_type_of_cooperation vtoc WHERE vtoc.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id) AS type_of_cooperation_id, (SELECT max(level_code) FROM v_type_of_implementation vtoi WHERE vtoi.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id) AS type_of_implementation_id, (SELECT max(id) FROM v_procurement_system vps WHERE vps.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id) AS procurement_system_id,
CAST(NULL as bigint) AS component_id, (999999999) AS agreement_id,
NULL AS capital_spend_percent, NULL AS disaster_response,
'DN' AS src_role, cast (NULL as text) as dest_role, cast (NULL as bigint) as dest_org_id,
cast (999999999 as bigint) as related_entity_id
FROM amp_activity_version aav JOIN v_donors vd ON vd.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id
UNION ALL
SELECT ct.amp_activity_id AS amp_activity_id, 999888777 AS funding_id, ct.amp_component_funding_id AS amp_fund_detail_id, ct.transaction_type AS transaction_type, ct.adjustment_type AS adjustment_type, ct.transaction_date AS transaction_date, ct.date_code AS date_code, ct.transaction_amount AS transaction_amount, (999999999) AS expenditure_class,
ct.currency_id AS currency_id,
ct.component_organisation_id AS originating_org_id, 999999999 AS financing_instrument_id, 999999999 AS terms_of_assistance_id, 999999999 AS funding_status_id, 999999999 AS mode_of_payment_id,
(SELECT max(amp_status_id) FROM v_status vs WHERE vs.amp_activity_id = ct.amp_activity_id) status_id, (SELECT max(level_code) FROM v_modalities vm WHERE vm.amp_activity_id = ct.amp_activity_id) modality_id, (SELECT max(level_code) FROM v_type_of_cooperation vtoc WHERE vtoc.amp_activity_id = ct.amp_activity_id) type_of_cooperation_id, (SELECT max(level_code) FROM v_type_of_implementation vtoi WHERE vtoi.amp_activity_id = ct.amp_activity_id) type_of_implementation_id, (SELECT max(id) FROM v_procurement_system vps WHERE vps.amp_activity_id = ct.amp_activity_id) procurement_system_id,
ct.amp_component_id AS component_id, 999999999 AS agreement_id,
NULL AS capital_spend_percent, NULL AS disaster_response,
cast ('DN' as text) as src_role, cast (NULL as text) as dest_role, cast (NULL as bigint) as dest_org_id,
cast (999999999 as bigint) as related_entity_id
FROM v_mondrian_component_transactions ct WHERE (ct.transaction_date BETWEEN '1970-1-1' AND '2050-1-1');
